data.actual_result: It's grey, and little hard to read the invite model.
data.expected_result: It should be darker, or have the yellow text like Android and iOS. (Not having the yellow text may be a designer choice, but thought it was a bit weird how android and iOS has it while desktop doesn't).
data.short_description: Invite link examples in the new invite model is too dark for dark theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the new invite model. - Click on the plus (+) button at the bottom of the servers. - Click "Join a server". - Observe the invite models.
